channel.title: NPC Kill Points Shop
channel.description: I have looked on google for a tutorial on this, but could not find one, only found a pk shop tut, and that one wasn't even good. I don't think it should be too hard? just edit shophandler.java, shops.cfg, and actionhandler.java, and shopassistant.java? i just dont know what to add.. can someone provide me with a little bit of help ? :palm: i have the npc kill points system up and everything, like the point system is working. just need a shop that i can purchase items out of with these points. Thank you

item.title: NPC Kill Points Shop
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you already have the npc kill point system, then you just need to add another shop just like any other point shop…
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/324907-pi-making-shops-accept-points-rather-than-money.html

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Kill Points Shop
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

If there is already a slayer point shop or anything similar that doesn’t use items as currency, try using that as a base. I’m sure you can use any of the PK point tutorials in order to accomplish what you’re trying to do.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Kill Points Shop
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:

I have looked on google for a tutorial on this, but could not find one, only found a pk shop tut, and that one wasn’t even good.
